name: Block Thing
description:
It is a basic go forward don't hit the blocks type of game. So um, yeah. Go forward, don't hit the blocks. Simple enough!

What's to come.

Nothing. As of April 15th, 2017, I am choosing to leave this project behind. It was only ment for me to practice and get an introduction back into Unity. If you lake it awesome, if you don't, well there isn't much left for ya. If you want to take a look at the source code, and look at the Unity files, you can download the full package.

What's been updated?

v0.2 -

Created new menu / saving system.

Added in new coins and adjusted scoring system.

Created a new jumping mechanic

Added one new level

Probably a couple of other things but I can't think of them...

Follow development.

If you actually care at all about this project, or me, come follow me on Twitter over at Twitter.com/Xeinix

Also, I will be writhing weekly update things on my adventures in Unity over here: Xeinix.ml/blog
